reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we have just returned from a 2 night stay at this hotel and it was lovely,staff and food were excellent as was the accomodation.so handyy for museum and parkland .such a pretty and quite place.we cant wait to go back.
reviews.title: fantastic food

likes.liked: — friendly staff and brilliant food and clean rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Friendly staff, clean rooms, good restaurant (if a bit pricey). Try their fantastic Tiramisu.
reviews.title: small friendly hotel
